definition: (onom.) patter, splatter, click/to smack one's lips/to pull (on a pipe)
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]

sentences.english: The door unbolted, whacked back against the wall.
sentences.chinese: 门打开时，吧嗒一声门儿碰着墙。

sentences.english: Dying fish were flopping about on the wooden boards.
sentences.chinese: 快要死的鱼在木板上吧嗒吧嗒地乱嘣。

sentences.english: Only the rain aroused intensive click sound.
sentences.chinese: 只有雨滴激起密集的吧嗒声。

sentences.english: I have reaction from the " Bata " telephone link.
sentences.chinese: 我还没反应过来，“吧嗒”电话挂了。

sentences.english: He smacked his lips but did not utter a word .
sentences.chinese: 他吧嗒两下嘴，一声也不言语。

sentences.english: Annabel was sweating droplets that fell to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 安娜贝利大汗直冒，汗滴吧嗒吧嗒地落在了地上。

to sip/to smack one's lips/to taste/to savor
